message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we've discussed, this product is worth $1500000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for a price that I think is very reasonable, considering the value it will bring to your life. I'm offering it to you for $1400000. I think this is a fair and competitive price, and I believe you'll be thrilled with your decision to purchase it. What do you think?
